education.Notes: Title of PhD thesis: Run-time Support for Parallel Object-Oriented Computing. The research work involved the implementation of an all-in software object-based DSM system, novel object caching techniques for distributed systems, and a new lazy task creation technique. The thesis dealt with design and implementation issues in the areas of load-balancing, high-speed communications, and clustering.
Achieved highest marks in year. Dissertation work was in the area of run time support for mobile agents.
Second in class. Final-year project on DNS and sendmail was awarded with distinction.
